Test Name: MUCOR (Fungal Culture/PCR), IgE, and Serum Tests
Specimen Type: Tissue biopsy or swab for MUCOR; Serum or plasma for IgE and other serum assays
Purpose: To detect Mucor fungal infection, measure total IgE for allergy evaluation, and perform routine serum-based diagnostics
Container: Sterile container for tissue/swab; Serum Separator Tube (SST) for blood samples
Equipment: Sabouraud Dextrose Agar plates with incubator, PCR thermal cycler, ELISA kit or automated immunoassay analyzer, and general chemistry analyzer
